about_the_game:
BEYOND THE PLASTIC WALL is an atmospheric narrative puzzler about hope, decay and the things we cannot fix.



In the shoes of a young scavenger, you'll set off on a journey across a strange continent that will take you over lonely archipelagos, ancient machine graveyards and barren wastelands - and eventually into the chaotic, bustling alleyways, seedy bars and towering skyscrapers of the last city at the end of the world.



You'll repair, manipulate and fiddle with a varied range of mechanical and tactile puzzles to progress the story but also to unlock optional story elements. Every puzzle presents unique challenges but they all work on a shared logic. At first they will seem alien and opaque but as your understanding of these devices deepen, so will their complexity.



Rich in details, BEYOND THE PLASTIC WALL utilises innovative graphical and visual rendering techniques to create a wholly unique look and experience.
